full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA'I SGRUB THABS ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA MKHAN PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI DGE SGRUB GNYER BA BSTAN PA YAR 'PHEL GYIS STOBS BZHI'I BSHAGS BSNGAMS BYED TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA 'DI'I MTSAN NI ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN ZHES BYA'O, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
